title: i need 24 rp heres a fine piece of RP art
body: im 24 rp short of buying the best chroma ever created rito plz help me

replies.body: Is that Pool Party Graves?  All the fuzz gives it away, but I swear it looks like he's giving us the finger.  xD  Thanks for the drawing, you might have found that some poros rummaged through your account.  :)
